<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Import User Data</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	//create assignmentgroup.
	let group = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
	group.initialize();
	group.name = source.u_assignment_group;
	//set group type incident
	group.type = "654da04a2b61651053504cfbad01a094";
	//insert function
	x_snc_devtools.GlideRecordInsert(group); 
	
	//get persona group
	


})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_1138257_sm_now_o_user_data_import</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-16 12:09:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>7ed29f8193bb75104a61f15a7bba10e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import User Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SM.now OnBoarding Application" source="x_1138257_sm_now_o">4a2e91e6936331104a61f15a7bba10e3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SM.now OnBoarding Application">4a2e91e6936331104a61f15a7bba10e3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_7ed29f8193bb75104a61f15a7bba10e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-16 14:18:02</sys_updated_on><target_table>sys_user_grmember</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
